item.title: Neighbour dog fouling, 24th September
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, Scena Way, Camberwell, London

item.title: Abandoned Caravan - Urgent Assistance Required, 24th September
item.description:
We are the managing agents acting on behalf of the Right to Manage company for Scholars Court. We wish to report an abandoned vehicle that has been parked in an unauthorised bay for over 2 years. The vehicle is a large caravan that is obstructing access for the council refuse team and emergency services, such as the ambulance that attends the estate regularly. The caravan belongs to a tenant of the block, which is owned by Clarion Housing Association, but they have been unable to secure its removal. Numerous residents have raised concerns and complaints regarding this vehicle, and we are therefore seeking the councilâ€™s assistance in arranging its removal under the relevant abandoned vehicle legislation. Thank you for your assistance,

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, Worcester Close, Crystal Palace, London
Report on FixMyStreet
